message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us. I propose a price of $750,000 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you coming down to $750,000, but I'm still a bit over my budget. I'm willing to pay $700,000 for the product, but that's my final offer.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your position and would like to come closer to your offer. I am proposing to sell the product for $725,000. I hope this proposal works for you.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $725,000 is still a bit more than I can afford right now. I'm sticking to my previous offer of $700,000. This is the best I can do.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After reviewing our costs and the value of the product, I am willing to sell it for $715,000. I believe this offers a fair compromise while still allowing us to maintain a profitable margin.
